iati-activity.title: WaterAid Mali
iati-activity.description: WaterAid has been working in Mali since 2000 and collaborates with partners in five of Mali's eight regions. WaterAid has established communal tap stands in urban areas while rural communities have been helped to deepen and protect hand-dug wells from contamination. Sanitation and hygiene education schemes are also carried out.WaterAid aims to target the most vulnerable sections of society in Mali, including women, the disabled and the elderly. WaterAid has helped nearly 60,000 people gain access to water and sanitation. Local centres selling spare parts have been set up to enable communities to repair their own water and sanitation facilities. WaterAid has influenced national policies, raising the profile of the water and sanitation sector. In order to reach marginalised groups in Mali, WaterAid carried out research into gender in 2005 and developed a project to work with disabled people.
iati-activity.participating-org: ALPHALOG-Association Libre pour l’Habitat et le Logement
APROFEM - Association pour la Promotion de la Femme et de l’Enfant au Mali
ARAFD-Association de Recherche Action Femmes et Développement
Association Libre pour la Promotion de l'Habitat et du Logement (ALPHALOG)
Association Malienne pour la Sauvegarde du Bien-Etre de la Famille
Association de Recherche - Action Femme et Développement
Association pour le Developpement Durable en Afrique
Coalition pour l'Approvisionnement en Eau Potable
iati-activity.activity-date: Financial year that WaterAid (re)started activities within the country

contact-info.mailing-address: Open data at WaterAid, 47-49 Durham Street, London, SE11 5JD, UK

budget.period-start: Forward looking data for WaterAid's 2012-2013 financial year (1st April to 31st March) are drawn from WaterAid's approved aspirational budgets and are estimates as at March 2013. The actual figures achieved will vary depending on a range of factors including the securing of the funding needed, challenges faced in the countries, etc.
budget.period-end: End of WaterAid 2012-13 financial year (1st April to 31st March)
